predicate.note: Frames file for 'shoehorn' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: put into a container with some difficulty

example.name: usually passive?
example.text: Accordingly, the hidebound traditionalist reconstructed hypothetical organisms from the Burgess fossils in such a way that they could be shoehorned [*-1] into familiar categories.

roleset.note: A fascinating word; probably not one person in ten still living has even seen a shoehorn and yet we all still know instinctively what this verb means.
